form.title: Submission
form.description:
Please make sure to fill out all sections of the application. While you should provide clear details of your project timelines and scope, an application with lengthy responses is not necessarily preferable! We read through many submissions, so if you can concisely convey your ideas, we would greatly appreciate it. All applications will be received and reviewed on a rolling basis. Only one application per individual and/or team can be submitted at a time.

After completing your projectâ€™s pre-specified milestones, an individual or team can re-apply for another grant. Grants are issued in NEAR tokens but payment methods such as USD/ EUR can be issued in exceptional circumstances.

projectName.label: Project Name
projectName.error: Please enter a project name that is at least 3 characters long.

grantType.label: Are you applying for a grant (non-equity) or venture funding (equity)?
grantType.placeholder: Are you applying for a grant (non-equity) or venture funding (equity)?

projectDescription.label: Project Description
projectDescription.error: Please enter a project description that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

fundingAmount.label: How much funding are you requesting?
fundingAmount.error: Please enter a funding amount that is at least 1 USD.

whatAndWhy.label: What are you building & why?
whatAndWhy.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

competitionDifference.label: What makes you different from your competitors?
competitionDifference.placeholder: What makes you different from your competitors?
competitionDifference.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

openSourceState.label: Is your project open-source?
openSourceState.error: Please select an open source status.

opensourceComponentUse.label: Which components of the project will be open source?
opensourceComponentUse.placeholder: Which components of the project will be open source?
opensourceComponentUse.error: Please enter explanation that is at least 1 characters long and less than 100.

tx_error.title: The transaction failed
tx_error.description: The transaction failed. Please try again.

generic.title: The submission failed
generic.description: Please review the form errors below, and try again
